parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Type of tolerance as defined in swTolType_e

parameters.name: TolMax
parameters.description: Maximum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMin
parameters.description: Minimum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMaxFit
parameters.description: Text for the maximum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type

parameters.name: TolMinFit
parameters.description: Text for the minimum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type

parameters.name: UseDocPrec
parameters.description: True to use the document's precision value, false to use value specified for Precision

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: Precision to use for this dimension if UseDocPrec is false

parameters.name: ArrowsIn
parameters.description: Arrow direction as defined in swDimensionArrowsSide_e

parameters.name: UseDocArrows
parameters.description: True to use the document's arrow types, false to use values specified for Arrow1 and Arrow2

parameters.name: Arrow1
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use for the first arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: Arrow2
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use for the second arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: PrefixText
parameters.description: Text to display before the dimension, but on the same line (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SuffixText
parameters.description: Text to display after the dimension, but on the same line (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ShowValue
parameters.description: True to display the value of the dimension in the user interface, false to not

parameters.name: CalloutText1
parameters.description: Callout text to display above the dimension

parameters.name: CalloutText2
parameters.description: Callout text to display below the dimension

parameters.name: DimensionLowerText
parameters.description: Text to display below the dimension line; valid for display dimensions in drawings only

parameters.name: CenterText
parameters.description: True to center the text in the dimension, false to not

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: ConfigNames
parameters.description: Names of the configurations to which to apply these edits (see Remarks )

title: IModelDocExtension.EditDimensionProperties
signature:
System.Boolean EditDimensionProperties( 
   System.Int32
TolType
,
   System.Double
TolMax
,
   System.Double
TolMin
,
   System.String
TolMaxFit
,
   System.String
TolMinFit
,
   System.Boolean
UseDocPrec
,
   System.Int32
Precision
,
   System.Int32
ArrowsIn
,
   System.Boolean
UseDocArrows
,
   System.Int32
Arrow1
,
   System.Int32
Arrow2
,
   System.String
PrefixText
,
   System.String
SuffixText
,
   System.Boolean
ShowValue
,
   System.String
CalloutText1
,
   System.String
CalloutText2
,
   System.String
DimensionLowerText
,
   System.Boolean
CenterText
,
   System.Int32
ConfigOption
,
   System.Object
ConfigNames
)

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Type of tolerance as defined in swTolType_e

parameters.name: TolMax
parameters.description: Maximum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMin
parameters.description: Minimum value for the tolerance

parameters.name: TolMaxFit
parameters.description: Text for the maximum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type

parameters.name: TolMinFit
parameters.description: Text for the minimum FIT value when using a fit tolerance type

parameters.name: UseDocPrec
parameters.description: True to use the document's precision value, false to use value specified for Precision

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: Precision to use for this dimension if UseDocPrec is false

parameters.name: ArrowsIn
parameters.description: Arrow direction as defined in swDimensionArrowsSide_e

parameters.name: UseDocArrows
parameters.description: True to use the document's arrow types, false to use values specified for Arrow1 and Arrow2

parameters.name: Arrow1
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use for the first arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: Arrow2
parameters.description: Type of arrow to use for the second arrow of this dimension as defined in swArrowStyle_e if UseDocArrows is false

parameters.name: PrefixText
parameters.description: Text to display before the dimension, but on the same line (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SuffixText
parameters.description: Text to display after the dimension, but on the same line (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ShowValue
parameters.description: True to display the value of the dimension in the user interface, false to not

parameters.name: CalloutText1
parameters.description: Callout text to display above the dimension

parameters.name: CalloutText2
parameters.description: Callout text to display below the dimension

parameters.name: DimensionLowerText
parameters.description: Text to display below the dimension line; valid for display dimensions in drawings only

parameters.name: CenterText
parameters.description: True to center the text in the dimension, false to not

parameters.name: ConfigOption
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: ConfigNames
parameters.description: Names of the configurations to which to apply these edits (see Remarks )

returns: True if the dimension is modified, false if not
remarks:
PrefixText and SuffixText must not include "/r/n".
This method:
always changes the dimension's parameters in the active configuration. For example, if you specify swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration for ConfigOption and do not specify the name of the active configuration in ConfigNames, then the dimension parameters in the active configuration are affected.
does not support
hole callouts
.
